content: Take the first step towards optimal health with our personalized Ayurveda treatment plans. Our expert Ayurveda doctors will work closely with you to understand your unique health concerns, such as gut imbalances, immunity issues, or chronic pain. Through a comprehensive consultation, we will identify the root cause of your disorder and create a customized treatment plan tailored to your specific needs. Our plans may include dietary guidance, herbal remedies, yoga and meditation, and lifestyle modifications to help you achieve lasting wellness and vitality. Let us help you find balance and harmony in your body, mind, and spirit

whatWeOffer.title: SHIRODHARA
whatWeOffer.description: Indulge in profound relaxation and mental clarity with the ancient therapy of Shirodhara, featuring a gentle stream of warm oil cascading over the forehead, soothing the nervous system.
whatWeOffer.points:
Ayurvedic oil massage | Aromatherapy
Meditation or mindfulness exercises
Sound therapy sessions

whatWeOffer.title: PANCHAKARMA DETOX
whatWeOffer.description: Ayurvedic Panchakarma is a highly popular wellness resort program that is offered exclusively to guests seeking natural detoxification and rejuvenation. This five step cleansing program helps in gut health management, weight loss, and synchronization of mind and body for holistic well-being. The duration of this program can be of 7,10, 14, or 21 days.
whatWeOffer.points:
Biomarker analysis and checking vital parameters
Dhara Therapy | Panchakarma Therapies
Ayurvedic Massages | Snehana Process
Pranayama or Yogic Cleansing
